intensity: Select a weight that allows you to complete the prescribed reps while leaving about 2 solid reps in the tank.
name: 5 Day Beginner Hybrid Calisthenics & Equipment Workout
description: A beginner-friendly hybrid workout that blends bodyweight and equipment-based exercises to develop strength, endurance, and mobility. Ideal for those starting their fitness journey.

name: Home Workout
intensity: Select a weight that allows you to complete the prescribed reps while leaving about 2 solid reps in the tank.
description: A home-based workout focusing on multiple muscle groups. The program is split into three days: Day 1 targets legs, shoulders, and abs; Day 2 focuses on chest and back; Day 3 works the arms and abs.

exercises.exerciseName: Dumbbell Bench Press or Floor Press

name: Beginner Workout
intensity: Select a weight that allows you to complete the prescribed reps while leaving about 2 solid reps in the tank.
description: A full body strength training program focusing on main lifts and accessory exercises, split into three full body sessions per week.

name: Intermediate Workout
intensity: Select a weight that allows you to complete the prescribed reps while leaving about 2 solid reps in the tank. To increase intensity, go to your limit on the last set.
description: An intermediate workout split over 4 days focusing on upper and lower body movements with compound and accessory exercises.

name: Advanced Workout
intensity: Select a weight that allows you to complete the prescribed reps while leaving about two solid reps in the tank. To increase intensity, go to failure on the last set.
supersetInstructions: Complete the initial set of the first movement immediately followed by the second movement. Repeat until all designated reps and sets are complete.
description: An advanced, multi-day training program utilizing compound movements and supersets to maximize muscle engagement and strength gains.

exercises.exerciseName: T-Bar Rows or Seated Cable Rows
